module.name: HTML Transformation Module
module.description: Creates HTML output of Models. Models can be input or transformed models of a VDM.

parameter.name: Output
parameter.description: Define a output path. A relative path is resolved to the configspace/module configuration output path. An absolute path can contain pure-variants path variables.

parameter.name: Mode
parameter.description: Define which transformation mode should be used. "Result Models Tailored" mode tailors models according to variant description model. "Result Models Annotated" mode annotates models according to variant description model. "Input Models Only" mode exports models with no transformation.

parameter.name: Layout
parameter.description: Define a tree layout (name of an existing tree layout). A layout allows to hide unnecessary information (e.g. restrictions, constraints, attributes, etc.).

parameter.name: Filter
parameter.description: Define a filter (name of an existing filter). A filter allows to hide elements by boolean expressions (and there combination with boolean operators) evaluating different information of the model, elements, attributes and much else.

parameter.name: Stylesheet
parameter.description: Define if a stylesheet should be used. If yes you can decide to link or to inline the stylesheet.

parameter.name: Stylesheet Path
parameter.description: Define which stylesheet should be used. If not especially defined the pure::variants default Stylesheet is used.

parameter.name: Model Type Filter
parameter.description: Define which model types will be generated into html output files.

parameter.name: Model Name Filter
parameter.description: Define which models will be generated into html output files. Models are used, if their names match the given regular expression.

parameter.name: Merge
parameter.description: Set true if models should be generated into one html output file. The file name is set to VDM name.
